#include <stdio.h>
 
#define LL long long
 
LL modmul(LL a,LL b,LL m)
{
    LL q=(LL)(((long double)a*(long double)b)/(long double)m);
	LL r=a*b-q*m;
	r %= m;
	if(r<0)
	    r+=m;
	return r;
}
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    LL i, a, b, c, n;
    while (t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &b);
        a = 1;
        c = b<<1;
        for (i=1; i<=n; i++)
            a = modmul(a, i, c);
        if (a<b)
            printf("Even\n");
        else
            printf("Odd\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
